The noble ingratitude a pastoral-tragi-comedy / by Sr. William Lower, Knight. Généreuse ingratitude. English Quinault, Philippe, 1635-1688. Lower, William, Sir, 1600?-1662.
[9], 7-101, [2] p. : port.
Imprinted by John Ramzey, Hage : 1659.
Erraa [sic] on p. [2] at end. First edition. Translation of La généreuse ingratitude. Reproduction of original in Dyce Collection, Victoria and Albert Museum.
